title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 12 March 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:01 <sburjan\_> has joined #xwiki  
00:03 <sburjan`> has quit  
00:03 <sburjan\_> is now known as <sburjan`>  
01:45 <jvelo> has quit  
02:21 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki  
02:51 <jvelo> has quit  
03:50 <CIA-120> Andreas Jonsson stable-3.5.x \* rf8cdbe0 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/f8cdbe007a23ebd4a1a8959d5949a9b58e1c7d4c / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-appwithinminutes/src/main/resources/AppWithinMinutes/LiveTableGenerator.xml : XWIKI-7610: LiveTable generator does not escape XWiki syntax in JSON strings. ...  
04:10 <DrLou> has quit  
05:04 <tekzilla> has quit  
05:10 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
07:22 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:42 <rrodriguez> has quit  
08:08 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:19 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:20 <vmassol> good morning  
08:20 <sburjan`> has quit  
08:20 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
08:21 <vmassol> XMLRC test broken: http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-xmlrpc/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-xmlrpc/1114/testReport/org.xwiki.test.xmlrpc/SearchTest/testSearchAllPageIds/  
08:21 <vmassol> Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException: null  
08:21 <vmassol> at com.xpn.xwiki.doc.XWikiDocument.getTranslationList(XWikiDocument.java:5408) ~[xwiki-platform-legacy-oldcore-4.0-20120310.221301-98.jar:na]  
08:21 <vmassol> any idea?  
08:22 <vmassol> mflorea: 5 test failures here: http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/1053/testReport/  
08:22 <+mflorea> vmassol: I kow  
08:22 <+mflorea> know  
08:22 <vmassol> (same on 3.5 branch)  
08:24 <vmassol> tmortagne: this one is strange: http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/1125/testReport/org.xwiki.test.selenium/WikiEditorTest/testEditComment/  
08:24 <vmassol> I don't think we have a block renderer for syntax 1.0  
08:24 <vmassol> Caused by: org.xwiki.component.manager.ComponentLookupException: Can't find descriptor for the component [role = [interface org.xwiki.rendering.renderer.BlockRenderer] hint = [xwiki/1.0]]  
08:25 <+tmortagne> vmassol: yes that renderer does not exists  
08:25 <+tmortagne> so that means some code has been change and forgot to take into account xwiki/1.0 special case  
08:26 <+tmortagne> but no sure why a renderer would be needed during preview  
08:26 <+tmortagne> (except for the html renderer)  
08:27 <+tmortagne> getRenderedTitle  
08:28 <+tmortagne> does not make sense, I don't see why we would render a title in xwiki/1.0 syntax  
08:28 <+tmortagne> sounds like the source of the document haas been use instead of html or something like that  
08:29 <+mflorea> I recently fix http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-6934  
08:30 <+mflorea> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/eab39b5383a1ee1097eb1bc53b2ea75897715f1d  
08:30 <+mflorea> so there's an issue with getRenderedTitle for xwiki/1.0 syntax  
08:31 <+tmortagne> mflorea: the parameter of this method is the target syntax not the source syntax  
08:31 <+tmortagne> so it doe snot make any sens to put xwiki/1.0  
08:32 <+tmortagne> what is the goal here ?  
08:33 <+tmortagne> from what I can see in the code we want html  
08:33 <+tmortagne> so I don't understand why we pass $tdoc.getSyntax()  
08:33 <+mflorea> tmortagne: I fixed the typo, i.e. the method name  
08:33 <+mflorea> I supposed the rest was fine..  
08:34 <+tmortagne> I know but IMO no it's not fine  
08:34 <+tmortagne> it does not make any sense  
08:36 <+mflorea> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/7a51ada261565e54aa608ffcafad68db66c188c7  
08:36 <+tmortagne> pretty old  
08:37 <+mflorea> yes..  
08:38 <+tmortagne> plus getDisplayTitle is not deprecated...  
08:39 <+tmortagne> should probably be simply reverted  
08:39 <+tmortagne> actually no  
08:39 <+mflorea> what about the xml escaping  
08:39 <+tmortagne> I guess the goal was to render in plain  
08:39 <+tmortagne> I'm not sure  
08:39 <+mflorea> I think the preview should display the title exactly like in view mode  
08:39 <+tmortagne> probleme is that this change has nothing to do with the comment  
08:40 <+tmortagne> I think yes  
08:40 <+tmortagne> render with plain is for meta  
08:40 <+tmortagne> in any case preview should do what view does  
08:41 <+tmortagne> as simple as thaat  
08:41 <+mflorea> yep, I can handle that  
08:41 <+tmortagne> ok  
08:42 <sburjan`> has quit  
08:43 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
09:11 <CIA-120> tmortagne master \* rbbbbc14 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/bbbbc1465fa4b26957431cc52aa8d14cf79d6474 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-repositories/xwiki-platform-extension-repository-xwiki/xwiki-platform-extension-repository-xwiki-server-ui/src/main/resources/ExtensionCode/ExtensionJSON.xml : XWIKI-7611: Wiki related escaping issues in XR - http://git.io/lICvbw  
09:41 <CIA-120> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* r0330507 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/0330507a8a7712aab3a8fd8e2643d34463770ac0 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-web/src/main/webapp/templates/preview.vm : XWIKI-6934: Preview action doesn't displays the page's title ...  
09:41 <CIA-120> Marius Dumitru Florea stable-3.5.x \* r07abc80 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/07abc800d0ead129b22b742e3ae36b91e38b7f4f / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-web/src/main/webapp/templates/preview.vm : XWIKI-6934: Preview action doesn't displays the page's title ...  
09:57 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
10:01 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:11 <+mflorea> tmortagne: isn't {{velocity wiki="false"}}...{{velocity}} equivalent to {{velocity}}{{{...}}}{{/velocity}} (i.e. use verbatim block) ?  
10:11 <+tmortagne> mflorea: no it's not  
10:11 <+mflorea> what's the difference?  
10:11 <+tmortagne> wiki=false mean it's parsed with plain/1.0 parser  
10:12 <+tmortagne> to get proper content  
10:12 <+tmortagne> verbatim block is a pain to manipulate and produce html  
10:12 <+tmortagne> like <pre> etc.  
10:12 <+tmortagne> IMO this block should not even exist  
10:12 <+tmortagne> so lets use it the less possible  
10:13 <+mflorea> my issue is that https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/6beee7391d835f57bd38022cd4f7e78232e0afbf breaks the AWM because the velocity block has an if, and one branch need wiki syntax, and the other doesn't. So I guess you're saying the solution is to split the velocity block  
10:14 <+tmortagne> I don't see what this has to do with verbatim block  
10:14 <+tmortagne> wiki syntax would not be interpreted in the verbatim block either  
10:15 <+mflorea> no, my idea was to wrap the branch that doesn't need wiki syntax in verbatim block  
10:15 <+tmortagne> you have one part for the JSON and another for when viewing the page itself ?  
10:15 <+mflorea> yep  
10:16 <+tmortagne> is that really needed ?  
10:16 <+mflorea> wdym?  
10:16 <+tmortagne> why having a view mode ? just JSON is well enough IMO  
10:16 <+mflorea> no  
10:17 <+mflorea> one part is the live table results, and one part generates the live table  
10:17 <+mflorea> by "viewing the page itself" I understood viewing the live table  
10:17 <+tmortagne> couldn't you have several pages ?  
10:18 <+mflorea> sure.. but the one that generates the live table results would be a few lines of code, because I just need to do a replace..  
10:19 <+mflorea> I'd rather keep the code together  
10:19 <+tmortagne> problem is that splitting the velocity block will not help you much  
10:19 <+mflorea> why?  
10:20 <+mflorea> I'll duplicate the test ofc  
10:20 <+tmortagne> or you mean two if with no else ?  
10:20 <+mflorea> yep  
10:20 <+tmortagne> that would no it indeed  
10:22 <+mflorea> I'll do so. The part that generates the live table results is a temporary hack because AWM doesn't generate/register a translation page and I have to replace a translation key in the live table results.  
10:23 <+mflorea> so I prefer to keep it in the same page as the generator until I don't need it  
10:23 <+tmortagne> ok  
10:23 <+mflorea> s/generator/live table generator  
10:23 <+tmortagne> any case using verbatim block is not safe because if you have }}} in your content it will break it  
10:23 <+mflorea> ah, right  
10:24 <+tmortagne> in other scripr macro you can directly return the blocks you want so you could have a if in the same block but it's too hard with velocity to do things like that  
10:46 <+tmortagne> anyway have some blocker stuff to commit for 4.0M1 ?  
10:46 <+tmortagne> mflorea ?  
10:46 <vmassol> yes today is supposed to be 4.0M1  
10:46 <vmassol> who is the RM?  
10:47 <+tmortagne> me  
10:47 <vmassol> ok  
10:47 <vmassol> I would have liked to commit the new irc bot app  
10:47 <vmassol> but  
10:47 <+mflorea> tmortagne: no, I just need to fix the AWM  
10:47 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
10:47 <+mflorea> almost done  
10:47 <vmassol> I need a few more hours to finish the first part of it (ie everything but without the jira and search botlets) so maybe I should just do it for 4.0M2 instead especially since it's not that important for 4.0M1  
10:48 <+tmortagne> mflorea: ok  
10:48 <vmassol> (I can change all the @since 4.0M1 I have put everywhere ;))  
10:48 <+tmortagne> reviewing jira issues  
10:48 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
10:48 <+tmortagne> vmassol: we can realease tomorrow  
10:48 <+tmortagne> give time to write RN etc.  
10:48 <vmassol> yes but I don't think we should block just for this  
10:49 <vmassol> also I don't know if I'll have time to finish the jira and search botlets by tomorrow  
10:49 <vmassol> but if we decide to release tomorrow I'll try  
10:49 <vmassol> I also need to find out how to copy the history from xwiki-contrib to xwiki and that may take several hours :)  
10:50 <vmassol> (I'd rather not loose my history since I took care to make it nice)  
10:50 <+Denis> +1 for tomorrow, I have no time today to write RN about migration  
10:50 <vmassol> we need to stabilize the build too  
10:50 <vmassol> I've pinged Eduard about some failing tests  
10:50 <vmassol> but he hasn't responded yet  
10:51 <+tmortagne> vmassol: https://github.com/apenwarr/git-subtree  
10:51 <vmassol> yes I know this link  
10:51 <+tmortagne> 'git subtree' add is perfecy for your use case  
10:51 <+tmortagne> put a whole repository as subfloder of another one  
10:51 <+tmortagne> put=merge  
10:52 <vmassol> loos woryying  
10:52 <vmassol> worrying  
10:52 <vmassol> there are so many files in this project just to do this....  
10:52 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
10:52 <vmassol> ah it adds a command to my git commands, nice  
10:52 <+tmortagne> yes  
10:53 <+tmortagne> and then it will merge you contrib repo in the platform one with one command  
10:53 <+tmortagne> pretty nice  
10:53 <vmassol> have you tried it?  
10:53 <vmassol> it says experimental and last time it was updated was 2 years ago  
10:53 <+tmortagne> nop I looked at it for the move from platform to commons  
10:54 <+tmortagne> it was working wel but was not good enough at filtering history  
10:54 <+tmortagne> but if there is no history to filter it should be ok  
11:05 <+tmortagne> vmassol: it's a script so you can look at what it's doing, it's probably not very complex for the add command  
11:06 <+tmortagne> it's basically about adding xwiki-contrib as remote in your local xwiki-platform and merging its master with the platform master  
11:06 <+tmortagne> plus moving some folders  
11:08 <+tmortagne> vmassol: should I remove the fix for from XCOMMONS-62 or do you think you will really work on it during 4.0 ?  
11:09 <vmassol> checking  
11:10 <CIA-120> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* rd69d33f https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/d69d33f03da8073d1baf8d55e9f65bcecc436770 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-appwithinminutes/src/main/resources/AppWithinMinutes/LiveTableGenerator.xml : XWIKI-7610: LiveTable generator does not escape XWiki syntax in JSON strings. ...  
11:10 <CIA-120> Marius Dumitru Florea stable-3.5.x \* r40a055f https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/40a055fdeed6af4b8f4c6521995fd623f38c437e / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-appwithinminutes/src/main/resources/AppWithinMinutes/LiveTableGenerator.xml : XWIKI-7610: LiveTable generator does not escape XWiki syntax in JSON strings. ...  
11:11 <+tmortagne> guys could you move issue assigned to you to the proper version  
11:11 <+mflorea> sure, doing it  
11:12 <+tmortagne> is it me of jira is super slow ?  
11:13 <vmassol> tmortagne: I've updated XCOMMONS-62  
11:13 <vmassol> jira looked ok to me  
11:14 <vmassol> I wonder why http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7564 has a wrong fix for  
11:14 <vmassol> it shouldn't even be possible  
11:15 <+tmortagne> indeed  
11:15 <vmassol> I can't see the history  
11:15 <vmassol> really strange  
11:15 <+tmortagne> yep there is pretty much nothing in the history  
11:15 <vmassol> ah the activity tab works  
11:16 <vmassol> hmm even that doesn't reflect the whole history  
11:16 <+tmortagne> nop  
11:16 <vmassol> let me check my mails  
11:17 <+tmortagne> Jira does not seems to need an indexing, no warning in the admin  
11:18 <vmassol> apparently he succeeded in creating assigning and setting the fix for in one go....  
11:18 <vmassol> he assigned me….  
11:19 <vmassol> fixing it  
11:19 <+tmortagne> vmassol: a jira client maybe  
11:19 <vmassol> jira client cannot do this  
11:19 <vmassol> it's a server protection  
11:19 <vmassol> noramlly  
11:19 <vmassol> normally  
11:19 <+tmortagne> ok, i tought it was just UI  
11:20 <vmassol> I'll put 4.0M2 as fix for since I think that's an  important issue to fix  
11:20 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:21 <+tmortagne> sdumitriu: what's the status of XWIKI-7498 ?  
11:21 <+tmortagne> could you answer to vmassol comment  
11:23 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:25 <evalica> has quit  
11:26 <evalica> has joined #xwiki

11:52 <+sburjan> I am going to test now a migration from 2.7.2 to 3.5 final on Oracle

11:56 <djoris> has joined #xwiki  
12:01 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
12:08 <@sdumitriu> Good morning  
12:08 <CIA-120> tmortagne master \* r058b8e4 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/058b8e4bd12e5f9036ff6be688afdc6d96ece71a / (15 files in 6 dirs): XWIKI-7612: Move JBossCache based implementation of cache API to retired ...  
12:13 <+sburjan> here are the results of the migration. I am unable to figure out if these stacktraces are caused by lucene or there is something underlying. Can someone take a look ? http://pastebin.com/FmQJfpCA  
12:14 <vmassol> Caused by: java.sql.SQLException: Invalid column type: getBLOB not implemented for class oracle.jdbc.driver.T4CLongRawAccessor  
12:14 <vmassol> this is the error IMO  
12:14 <+tmortagne> does not seems to have anything to do with lucene  
12:14 <+sburjan> ok, so I should report this  
12:15 <+sburjan> reporting now, maybe we manage to fix it until 3.5.1  
12:15 <+tmortagne> sound like wrong version of connector or something  
12:15 <+sburjan> I'll specify the JDBC driver I am using in the JIRA issue  
12:15 <+sburjan> is it okay like this ?  
12:17 <+tmortagne> not sure there is something we can do on our side but yes at least we will have all informations and we can explain what's wrong and how to fix it if that's just a JDBC driver version issue  
12:18 <vmassol> it's a bug on our side for sure  
12:19 <vmassol> (for sure = 80% sure :))  
12:19 <+sburjan> vmassol: using you cool snippet to get the JDBC driver :)  
12:19 <vmassol> sburjan: but this is on your own machine  
12:19 <vmassol> so you know the driver you're using!  
12:19 <vmassol> :)  
12:19 <+sburjan> yes, but for reproductibility I need to mention this in the issue ;)  
12:20 <vmassol> this issue shouldn't be that hard to fix  
12:20 <+sburjan> maybe you'll want to fix it and need to create the same environment :)  
12:20 <vmassol> but I don't have the time right now  
12:20 <+sburjan> reporting now  
12:20 <vmassol> sburjan: I think it's alreayd reported  
12:20 <vmassol> several times  
12:20 <vmassol> check the existing jiras  
12:20 <vmassol> for example: http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XE-1099  
12:21 <@sdumitriu> tmortagne: XWIKI-7498 should be redone using the new liquibase framework, I didn't start on that yet  
12:22 <+sburjan> yepp: here it is http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XE-1099  
12:22 <+tmortagne> sdumitriu: sure, would be nice to put a comment explaining that and maybe removing the fix for since it's not clear what is the state of the issue

12:22 <vmassol> lunch

15:22 <+mflorea> sdumitriu: I want to double-check something. In XWiki.LiveTableResultsMacros we have this:  
15:22 <+mflorea> #foreach($tag in $request.getParameterValues('tag'))  
15:22 <+mflorea>   #set($tag = $util.decodeURI($tag))  
15:22 <+mflorea> isn't the URI decoding useless? I don't see why the value of the tag parameter would be encoded twice.  
15:23 <+mflorea> s/useless/wrong  
15:23 <@sdumitriu> Indeed, it shouldn't be needed  
15:23 <+mflorea> ok, thanks  
15:23 <@sdumitriu> But it should be checked if the value isn't double encoded in the first place...  
15:23 <+mflorea> I'll check  
15:34 <+mflorea> sdumitriu: the tag isn't double-escaped. I added a tag "b%21ar" and the livetable tag filtering doesn't work on this tag because it looks for b!ar
